---
title: Cursor
description: 'Integrate Notte with Cursor through MCP Server'
---

## Overview

To integrate Notte with Cursor, follow these steps:

1. First, review the [Notte-MCP](/integrations/mcp) documentation to understand how to integrate Notte with Cursor through MCP Server.

2. Then, follow the steps in the [Cursor MCP Documentation](https://docs.cursor.com/context/model-context-protocol) to configure Cursor to use the Notte MCP Server for browser control.

### Server Configuration

Add the following configuration to your Cursor settings:

```json
{
    "mcpServers": {
        "notte-mcp": {
            "url": "https://api.notte.com/mcp",
            // For local development, use:
            // "url": "http://localhost:8000/sse"
            "env": {
                "NOTTE_API_KEY": "<your-notte-api-key>"
            }
        }
    }
}
```
